classes.description: Sound Intriguing?  Come and figure out your secret code and then see the colours pool magically before your eyes. Easy to do, just 2 classes.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 4mm x 32in circular needle & 1 skein Sweet Georgia Tough Love Sock yarn

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Diamond Kerchief Cowl
classes.description: A great cowl to tuck into your jacket on those cold mornings that are coming.If you’ve wanted to learn simple lace and increases & working in the round then this is the cowl KAL for you.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 4.5mm x 24in circular needle & 1 skein Ultra Alpaca

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Thrummed Mittens
classes.description: Let's get ready for winter! Do you have a special someone that you want to keep warm? Here is an easy way to make thrummed mittens, on just 2 needles.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 3.25mm & 4mm needles, 1 skein Berocco Vintage & Rovings

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Ruby's Hat
classes.description: Here is a cute little hat for a special someone.  It incorporates short rows, and picking up stitches.  Very easy, yarn does all the colour changing for you.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 4mm x 40cm circular needle and 1 ball of Riot

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: I'll Pack A Cowl for Rhinebeck  (2 classes)
classes.description: Let’s have some fun with this cowl, and do some colourwork. It will be as soft and cushy as the sheep that are on it.
classes.supplies: Materials needed -Berroco Vintage: 1 skein main colour, 1 skein contrast colour, 50 yards of white, and 25 yards of black, 4.5mm x 60cm circular needle
classes.prerequisites: You will need to know how to do two handed fair isle to make this cowl. We are offering a Technique Class to teach this on November 9, 2:00-3:00pm or 6:00-7:00pm, cost is $2.

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Evelyn Howard Shaw (2 classes)
classes.description: Want to make a shawl where gauge doesn’t matter, even the size of the yarn and needles don’t matter, let's go wild and create something beautiful!
classes.supplies: Materials needed -Lace-1 skein, 3.5mm x 60cm, Fingering-1 skein, 4mm x 60cm, Sport/DK-2 skins, 4.5mm x 80cm, Worsted-2 skeins, 5.5m x 80cm, Aran/Chunky-6mm x 80cm.

classes.title: Cast Offs - 1 class
classes.description: **Homework: cast on 40sts & knit 2-3 inches high in stocking stitch. You need to do 4 of these little samples. Keep one on your needles & leave the other 3 on waste yarn.

classes.description: Lace pattern reading and sample stitches **Homework:  cast on 40sts & knit 2-3 inches high in stocking stitch.

classes.title: Strawberry Sparkle shorty socks
classes.description: a non-wool option for summer, knitted out of Berroco's Comfort Sock (3 colours to choose from), takes 1 ball to complete

classes.title: Habiliments - 2 part class
classes.description: a toe-up sock, features a reverse Dutch heel & upper leg bead work, knitted from Sweet Georgia's Tough Love Sock in their semi-solids,(over 10 colours to choose from), takes 1 skein, crochet hook for beading may be purchased if required

classes.title: Camping Socks
classes.description: 4 colour sock created from Drops Fabel, Brown, 2 greys & red or    Blue, 2 greys & red, (please book your colour option in advance so we may have your kit ready, features a Fleegle heel, you will need to register for your class in July as sock needs to be, worked down to near the heel area in advance

classes.title: Zigzagular Socks
classes.description: featuring a wavy cable down the side of the sock, knitted out of your choice of Supersocke, Pix or Prose (1 ball)

classes.title: Crazy Socks
classes.description: - a new sock yarn ...... Lang Super Soxx Colour Cashmere in soft colourways, features lace knitting & cabling with a moss stitch toe
